column5: Experience Lake Conroe's breathtaking sunrise views overlooking from the waterfront balcony. All the comforts of home with a beautiful atmosphere & relaxing ambiance. Great for family vacations or couples to getting away to relax lakeside. Two bedrooms w/ luxury king beds, in-suite bathrooms w/ oversize tubs (one is a jacuzzi tub). Fully furnished kitchen to prepare meals for the entire family, eat-in living room & full sleep lounger. Clubhouse for events, boat launch, marina & dock slips.
